title: Zscaler Private Access - App Protection
description:
This dashboard provides deep visibility into App Protection traffic, policy enforcement, and inspection outcomes.
It highlights user activity, client IPs, HTTP methods, domains, and error patterns to identify potential risks.
It also tracks bytes processed, inspection efficiency, and protection events to ensure secure and optimized application access.

definition.content:
[Zscaler Private Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-private-access) securely enables user access to internal applications without the need for traditional VPNs.

This dashboard provides deep visibility into App Protection traffic, policy enforcement, and inspection outcomes.
It highlights user activity, client IPs, HTTP methods, domains, and error patterns to identify potential risks.
It also tracks bytes processed, inspection efficiency, and protection events to ensure secure and optimized application access.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Private Access Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/zscaler_private_access/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Error Status Code Distribution over Time
